name: The Lost Land
description:
Controls:

  • W, A, S, D to move
  • Right Click to aim, Left click to shoot
  • E to rewind
  • R trigger game reset

Explore The Lost World by clearing the dangers that come your way and by rebuilding the environment with your rewind powers.

The game misses sound and it's not in the state I would have liked it to be but unfortunately had very little time because of work and did not asses the scale of the project properly, but I am still happy with the result so far, will def update it in the future.

Also plase not the game has bugs and it's not in a perfect state.
